name: Trapped Within
description:
Follow Ana as she navigates through underground caves on an alien world in search of a way out, in hopes of finding the way home.

This is a single player rpg puzzler with horror elements where you control Ana as you navigate your way through a pyramid full of traps and mazes. Your goal is to get her through the underground caves and through the pyramid of traps that are in place to keep Humans from finding a way back to their home world of Earth, can you find the end and survive or will you ultimately die?
